alerts.description: When updated pods is not equal to the desired pods, deployment may get stuck
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] Deployment Stuck

alerts.description: Disk usage increased by more than 20% in the last day
alerts.name: Rate of change of disk usage

alerts.description: A Kubernets pod failed when checking its readiness probe
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] Readiness probe failed

alerts.description: Alert if any Kubernetes node is not ready
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] Node Not Ready

alerts.description: Lack of free swap space warning
alerts.name: Lack of free swap space warning

customNotification.titleTemplate: {{__alert_name__}} is {{__alert_status__}} on kubernetes.namespace.name = {{kubernetes.namespace.name}} and kubernetes.service.name = {{kubernetes.service.name}} and kubernetes.pod.name = {{kubernetes.pod.name}}

alerts.description: A Kubernetes service with repeated HTTP errors (400 and 500 status codes)
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] Service generating HTTP errors

alerts.description: No deployments should be in paused state for too long
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] Deployment Paused for Long

alerts.description: A Kubernetes pod failed to pull an image from the registry
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] Failed to pull image

alerts.description: A Kubernetes pod failed when checking its liveness proble
alerts.name: [Kubernetes]: Liveness probe failed

customNotification.titleTemplate: {{__alert_name__}} is {{__alert_status__}} on kubernetes.namespace.name = {{kubernetes.namespace.name}} and kubernetes.deployment.name = {{kubernetes.deployment.name}} and kubernetes.pod.name = {{kubernetes.pod.name}}

alerts.description: A Kubernetes pod failed to restart
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] CrashLoopBackOff

alerts.description: Not enough pods running for deployment
alerts.name: [Kubernetes] Pods Available less than desired

alerts.description: Alert if postgresql-sso Filesystem exceeds more than 60%
alerts.name: App - Prod - SSO - DB PVC Filesystem > 60%
